html:
Heyday, a US-based platform that buys and builds consumer brands that sell on Amazon.com Inc, has secured USD555 million in Series C venture funding co-led by The Raine Group and Premji Invest

In addition General Catalyst, Victory Park Capital and Khosla Ventures also participated in the funding

Deal In Brief

Sebastian Rymarz is the Chief Executive Officer and co-founder of Heyday.

Deal Value (US$ Million)555
Deal TypeVenture Finance
Sub-CategoryGrowth Capital/Expansion
Deal StatusCompleted: 2021-11-16

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Heyday (US)

Deal Rationale
